articles.description: The induction of Mehli Mistry, the estranged first cousin of the late Cyrus Mistry, on the boards of trusts, offers a view into how Ratan Tata, 84, is entrusting key allies with responsibilities.
articles.content: MUMBAI : Mehli Mistry, a director of M. Pallonji Group and a businessman seen to be a close associate of chairman Ratan Tata, has been inducted on the boards of two of the largest Tata Trusts, which … [+5231 chars]
